snippet.title: Stumbling through Prince of Persia 2 on Almost Everything
snippet.description:
Two years after investigating the first game, here's my look at all the versions of Prince of Persia 2! This time there are only five ports and a lot of them are much more similar than the original Prince, but each of them has their own personality that brings a little more (or less) to the game.

Thanks to Tangobunny for providing the FM Towns version!
